title: Video: Holy Mountain – Gunner
body:
In honour of the release of the _**Earth Measures**_ mini-album, which is out today on [Chemikal Underground](http://shop.chemikal.co.uk/acatalog/CHEM173.html "Tear-your-throat-out good"), here’s the video for _Gunner_, by hirsute Glaswegians **Holy Mountain**. Busting out the blocks with the kind of lower-than-hell riffery you’d expect from a song by a band with the same name as a Sleep record, _Gunner_ alone absolutely fucking destroys anything else I’ve heard in the heavy stakes this year. Shitting your pants never felt so good.

Begin your ascent [here](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Holy-Mountain/328120915411 "Praise be. ").
